alert.note: Alert for Covington; Jones (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Watch issued March 20 at 2:18AM CDT until March 21 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CDT THIS MORNING... ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Freeze Warning Monday morning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 26. For the Freeze Watch Tuesday morning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 32 possible. * WHERE...Covington and Jones Counties. * WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, until 10 AM CDT this morning. For the Freeze Watch, from late tonight through Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
